Introduction

Floria (Korean: 플로리아; Japanese: フロリア) was a four-member girl group under DK Entertainment. They debuted on August 11, 2020 with the single album "Chitty Chitty".

On April 18 2024, Sumi announced on her Instagram story that FLORIA had disbanded.
